1: lpadmin -p OfficeLaser -D 'Fuji Xerox DocuPrint CP225/228' -m 'foo2zjs:0/ppd/foo2zjs/Fuji_Xerox-DocuPrint_CM215.ppd' -o PageSize=A4 -o ColorMode=Color -v usb://FUJI%20XEROX/DocuPrint%20CP225/228%20w?serial=301943--CD

0:
more_set_headers "Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' ninerealmlabs.com *.ninerealmlabs.com;connect-src 'self' ninerealmlabs.com *.ninerealmlabs.com;img-src * data:;font-src 'self';frame-ancestors 'self';object-src 'none';script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' ninerealmlabs.com *.ninerealmlabs.com https://cdn.plot.ly;style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'";
more_set_headers "Cache-Control: public, max-age=86400";

apk add --no-cache jq;
until true; do
  echo "Checking fileflows status..."
  STATUS=$(curl -s --max-time 3 http://fileflows:5000/api/status)
  if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "fileflows unreachable, proceeding"
    exit 0
  fi

  PROCESSING=$(echo "$STATUS" | jq '.processing // 0')
  QUEUE=$(echo "$STATUS" | jq '.queue // 0')
  echo "Processing: $PROCESSING, Queue: $QUEUE"

  if [ "$PROCESSING" -eq 0 ] && [ "$QUEUE" -eq 0 ]; then
    echo "Processing and Queue are both 0"
    exit 0
  fi

  echo "Processing > 0, waiting"
  sleep 120
done
Secure note taking and to-do app with synchronisation capabilities
